CSI Awards

These new fun and informal CSI Awards have been created as a way of recognising and rewarding colleagues within the Continual Service Improvement team, and hopefully helping to bring some of our diverse work areas a little closer together, creating wider engagement and connection opportunities.

We have created them in such a way that hopefully everyone will have the opportunity to be involved, nominate colleagues and vote on the amazing shortlisted candidates. They’ll be some fun prizes for winners and of course a wall of fame to recognise their valuable contributions and colleague appreciation. I do hope that you’ll all take the time to join in, as I can’t wait to read all the nominations and have the opportunity to learn more about everyone.

Kay Deacey-Coulton
Head of CSI
